sen.e: Saneo was the maternal grandfather of three emperors; Emperor Gouda, Emperor Fushimi, and Emperor Hanazono, and was valued at the Imperial Court of both the Daikakuji lineage and the Jimyoin lineage.

sen.e: Kinkata TOIN, the fourth generation of the family, who is the author of "Kodaireki (a chronicle)" and "Entairyaku (a journal written by Kinkata)", and is also supposed to be the author of "Shugaisho (a book including maps)", was promoted to the Grand Minister.
